title: Waxing Gibbous
name: Lunar Phase - Waxing Gibbous
printed_effect:
Target a {lunar}-Enchanted Elestral
and change its Position.
You may Expend {lunar} and discard a Lunar Phase.
If you do, the targeted Elestral cannot be
destroyed by card effects once this turn.
effect: Target a {lunar}-Enchanted Elestral and change its Position. You may Expend {lunar} and discard a Lunar Phase. If you do, the targeted Elestral cannot be destroyed by card effects once this turn.
